about_the_game:
Doors Moor Doors is a puzzle-adventure game set in a mysterious underground facility filled with countless doors. Your mission is simple: escape. But finding your way out won't be easy. You'll need to search for items, solve puzzles, and make your way through complex environments, each with its own set of challenges. The game offers a variety of doors to unlock, each leading to new surprises or obstacles.

  • Explore an underground facility with countless doors.

  • Collect items to unlock doors and solve puzzles.

  • Encounter entities that can help you escape or not.

  • Solve a variety of puzzles with different difficulty levels.

  • Randomized item locations and enemy locations for replayability.

  • Manage your resources and time while evading threats.

    Every door opens to new corridors, identical and repetitive, blurring the lines between reality and madness. The deeper you go, the more unsettling the atmosphere becomes—subtle sounds echo from unseen spaces, flickering lights play tricks on your mind, and you start to question if you’re truly alone. Each step forward feels like a descent into the depths of your own psyche, making Doors Moor Doors not just a game, but a surreal endurance test.
detailed_description:
Doors Moor Doors is a puzzle-adventure game set in a mysterious underground facility filled with countless doors. Your mission is simple: escape. But finding your way out won't be easy. You'll need to search for items, solve puzzles, and make your way through complex environments, each with its own set of challenges. The game offers a variety of doors to unlock, each leading to new surprises or obstacles.

  • Explore an underground facility with countless doors.

  • Collect items to unlock doors and solve puzzles.

  • Encounter entities that can help you escape or not.

  • Solve a variety of puzzles with different difficulty levels.

  • Randomized item locations and enemy locations for replayability.

  • Manage your resources and time while evading threats.

    Every door opens to new corridors, identical and repetitive, blurring the lines between reality and madness. The deeper you go, the more unsettling the atmosphere becomes—subtle sounds echo from unseen spaces, flickering lights play tricks on your mind, and you start to question if you’re truly alone. Each step forward feels like a descent into the depths of your own psyche, making Doors Moor Doors not just a game, but a surreal endurance test.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6gb
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700KF
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

name: Doors More Doors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6gb
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700KF
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Doors Moor Doors is a game involving the lengthy process of opening doors testing the mentality of anyone who dares to play it.
